query:
SELECT 
  r.id,
  r.amount / 100.0 as valor_reais,
  r.paymentMethod,
  r.status,
  r.transactionId,
  DATE_FORMAT(r.createdAt, '%d/%m/%Y %H:%i:%s') as data_hora,
  c.email,
  c.pin
FROM recharges r
JOIN customers c ON r.customerId = c.id
WHERE c.email = 'xkelrix@gmail.com' AND r.amount = 233
ORDER BY r.createdAt DESC
command:

  r.status,
  r.transactionId,
  DATE_FORMAT(r.createdAt, '%d/%m/%Y %H:%i:%s') as data_hora,
  c.email,
  c.pin
FROM recharges r

WHERE c.email = 'xkelrix@gmail.com' AND r.amount = 233
